t: About Us | The History of Broil King - Broil King
s: May 7, 2024 - The history of Broil King and its parent company Onward Manufacturing, spans over 100 years. This blog looks at how it all started, from pens to barbecues.

t: The History of Broil King - Broil King
s: September 25, 2023 - Jacuzzi designs are the basis for the Broil King line of gas barbecues. At this point, the company was named Onward Multi-Corp. Around the same time, OMC was appointed sole Canadian distributor of Weber-Stephen Products Co.’s fine line of Weber gas grills.
